name: Shane Kosmicki
text: Food was really good. The staff greeted us promptly and got our drink orders. The large Hawaiian was pizza was delicious with bacon added to it.

name: Brian Smith
text: I love the pizza. It was fresh and tasty!

name: Alex Bilbao
text: Great delicious Pizza and salad, big portions, friendly staff and fresh food. We have been very positively surprised by the quality and the good price: We recommend!

name: PAUL RATHA YEM
text: Great food and great service.

name: cool 1
text: Great staff - fresh and fast.  They have some new beer on tap and Ballast Point Grapefruit Sculpin is one of my summer favorites.

name: Cynthia Adinig
text: Slowest service ever. They are severely understaffed. Food was bland except for the pizza. Our waiter was nice but over worked. The few people in the place got tired of the slow service and just left

name: Jonna Downing
text: 2 kids and I shared a large pizza while biking around the city. Frankly, I didn't expect much but was pleasantly surprised. Pizza had a nice crust, both crisp and chewy. Plenty of sauce that was not a sweet as usual and enough cheese to satisfy my kids as well. Will definitely go back again.

name: Ryan Glasshoff
text: If the Ledo Pizza chain food doesn‚Äôt bring you in then meeting the staff at this location will bring you back time and time again. With this being attached to the hotel they offer full menu all day that includes breakfast! The owner visited our table that has never happened anywhere I‚Äôve ever dined. Great place!

name: I√ëIGO GARC√çA P√âREZ
text: The food is not bad, but they decide for you in the tip?

name: Wes Smith
text: Food was good but, we ordered 4 chicken Fettuccine Alfredo with broccoli and paid extra to add mushrooms to 3 of them. Got the food back to the room and, no mushrooms. Went back this morning and showed them the receipt and pictures I took ‚Ä¶More

name: aju rai
text: Excellent service, awesome food. Thank you. We will miss this place. Me and my family will always come here when we visit Washington DC.

name: Eladio Bobadilla
text: This is really, really bad food. It is hard to overstate how bad it is. The prices are fine, but you're going to have to put up with some terrible food. You're better off finding a chain, to be honest. I would stay away from this place like the plague.

name: Shelby Schuppe
text: It was affordable and great tasting food. I ordered the spicy ravioli from the appetizer menu with a tossed salad. It was plenty of food for a meal and delicious.

name: Michala McClain
text: Pizza tasted like microwave dollar store pizza. Rubber texture. What was great was the rat we saw running in front of the building after we ate there.

name: Christina Dentham
text: Miss you guys. Friendly staff, great service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner all good food. Wish you were in New York :)

name: Channel Leftenant
text: 5 star customer service. Keep up the good work!

name: Steve Richeson
text: Cozy, comfort food. Pizza is surprisingly good, wings, beers, clean and the service is good. What's not to like?

name: Amjad Ali
text: Great place for pizza lovers. I love their white cheese pizza.

name: Karl Parrott
text:
My wife and I are here from NH.
This was some of the best rhin crust pizza ever.
The service was outstanding and the atmosphere very welcoming.

name: Amy Cresap
text: Pizza is okay but not good. I saw a rat running out as I walked in, and that truly killed my appetite. I had ordered a pizza for take out, and the hostess was not friendly in helping me pick up my pizza.

name: Ayushjav
text: Great place. Highly recommended. Friendly stuff

name: Cassandra Stepro
text: The food is delicious. This is the second time we have eaten here while on vacation. They have chicken fingers for my picky son and cheese ravioli for my finicky daughter. We will be back again before we head home.

name: Connor Hehn
text: The pasta is cheap and nasty. The pizza was greasy as a 13 year old boys acne covered face. The cake was a joke too. Tasted awful. The drinks were good but they also came in a can. We had a giant spider come out from nowhere and frolic on ‚Ä¶More

name: Madison Luallen
text: Let me start out with saying how sketchy the place looked. I felt as if I was going to be kidnapped the whole time I was there. When we got our food, it was as if they just ran out of actual Alfredo sauce and put leftover gravy from ‚Ä¶More

name: Tuwanna Glover
text: 1st time trying the spinach and chicken,  Wonderful.

name: Hakeem Khan
text: This place has many options for pizza. The service is nice.

name: Wilson Gonzalez
text: Corona Beer was too warm during a very hot day, used ice to chill it.   Inexpensive for all we ate.  Service was excellent. üòÉ

name: Marny Youngdahl
text: Bad breakfast.  Food has smell of old, possibly rancid grease.  The potatoes are just boiled and then lightly browned on one side.  No flavor, no crunch.  Orange juice tasted like it was from a can.

name: Joni Grant
text: The pizza was good. The staff, especially the waitress was quick, friendly and very accommodating. I would eat there again.

name: Doretha Steinberg
text: Worth the waiting in a line. Pizza is fresh and yummy!!! :)

name: Araceli Monroe
text: They brought my order wrong twice but staff was super nice and enjoyable. A small spider was on our table but I think that was just a fluke.

name: Joel Thomason
text: It was so hot I thought I had a seat in the oven. When I took a bite of pizza I thought I was drinking marinara sauce. I‚Äôm not even starting on the spiders. I wish I could give fewer stars.

name: Sergei Kutanov
text: Nice place. Had breakfast here for a few times. Not expensive and pretty tasty. Be careful, sometimes tips are already in the bill.

name: Jean-Fran√ßois Veilleux
text: Nice place. Food was good (cheesesteak sandwich and pizza) and prices are affordable.

name: Robert Marsh
text: Food was terrible. Essentially got a reheated lean cuisine and an unseasoned bowl of soup. Friendly and expedient service can only go so far.

name: Lisa Shuman
text: This was the worse food I have ate in many years. Italian my foot. Brothers pizza is ten times better than this place. I took three bites threw it away it was that bad.

text: It was across the parking from our hotel and the pizza was good and cheap. However, breakfast and other options for dinner were expensive for the quality.

name: Ann Cha
text: I had violent food poisoning after eating here. It ruined the remainder of our trip. If I could give no stars, I would.

name: C. Young
text: The chicken Alfredo was disgusting and the drinks were watered down. The pizza was decent.

name: John Reitz

text: Awesome pizza, but really greasy, good for a once every 6 months type of pizza.  The waffle fries are bomb.
